title: Virtual Assistant - Permanent Role
description:
*First - Why Join Mi PA?**

At Mi PA, our Virtual Assistants are a core part of our company, not just external support. Most of our VAs have been with us for years, and we invest in long-term relationships because we know that when you grow, we grow!

• The same holidays and length-of-service benefits as our UK team.

• Annual pay reviews as a minimum - your hard work will always be recognised.

• Opportunities for career development within a growing company.

• A dynamic, fast-paced role working with a variety of global clients.

• A friendly, supportive team that values and respects its Virtual Assistants.



**About Mi PA**

Mi PA is a leading UK-based virtual personal assistant and call answering service. Our Mi Call team ensures our clients never miss an important call, delivering seamless customer support. We’re looking for a Social Media Virtual Assistant to join our dynamic team, supporting our clients with content creation, social media management, and general administrative tasks.



**What You’ll Be Doing**

This is an execution-based role. You’ll receive requests from our friendly EAs, who, along with and text processes, will guide. Some of the tasks you’ll be responsible for could include:

• Customer Support
s

• Ordering Gifts and supplies

• Managing an Inbox

• Research tasks

• Customer service tasks

• Operational admin Tasks



This is a fast-paced role. If you are organised, detail-oriented, and love the process of getting things done, you’ll thrive here.



**Tools You Will Use**

• Pipedrive

• Gmail

• Office 365 & Teams

• Asana

• Harvest

• ChatGPT or similar AI tools, but be able to work without them too.



**What We’re Looking For**

• Excellent written English

• Detail-oriented – you double-check your work, especially if its sensitive information

• Able to manage your own workload and deadlines

• Can follow established processes and help meet weekly team goals

• Available during UK working hours, ideally up to 3.30pm UK time.

• Reliable, high-speed internet is a must!



**Your First Test Starts Now – Here’s How to Apply**

So, tell us why you’d make a truly exceptional VA, and let’s see if we’re a great fit :)

title: Recruiter
description:
We’re seeking a high-energy, resourceful, and self-motivated Recruiter who can keep pace with a fast-moving organization. This isn’t your typical recruiter role — we’re looking for a proactive talent strategist who can fill diverse seat types (from agents to support and specialized roles), drive full-cycle recruitment, and operate independently with confidence.



A strong plus for this role is experience hiring finance and accounting positions (e.g., bookkeepers, accountants, controllers) and comfortable operating across two LLCs, providing recruitment support for both depending on workload and business priorities. You should also be comfortable recruiting for multiple roles simultaneously, often across different functions and timelines.



What You’ll Be Doing

As a Recruiter, you’ll play a key role in shaping our workforce by identifying, engaging, and hiring exceptional talent across multiple functions. You’ll collaborate closely with HR, Operations, and key stakeholders to ensure that every hire aligns with our culture and performance standards.



Your Core Responsibilities

- Lead the end-to-end recruitment process for all seat types — from sourcing and screening to offer acceptance and onboarding.

- Craft job descriptions and job ads that attract the right candidates and accurately reflect role requirements.

- Proactively source talent across LinkedIn, job boards, referrals, and social platforms.

- Manage and update candidate pipelines through our ATS with precision and accuracy.

- Conduct screening interviews and assess candidates for skill set, culture fit, and growth potential.

- Hire confidently for finance and accounting roles, including bookkeepers, accountants, and similar functions.

- Recruit for multiple positions concurrently, balancing timelines, priorities, and candidate pipelines.

- Partner with hiring managers to refine job requirements and selection criteria.

- Maintain consistent candidate engagement and timely communication throughout the hiring lifecycle.

- Utilize hiring data to refine sourcing strategies and shorten time-to-fill.

- Provide market insights to support long-term talent planning.

- Operate seamlessly across two LLCs, ensuring hiring pipelines are managed efficiently for both.

- Contribute ideas for improving recruitment processes and campaigns to attract niche and passive talent.



What You’ll Bring to the Table

- Minimum 4 years’ experience in recruitment, headhunting, or talent acquisition within fast-paced environments.

- Proven ability to hire across multiple functions, including operations, support, finance, and accounting roles.

- Comfortable recruiting for multiple openings at the same time across varied departments.

- Experienced in creating job descriptions, ads, and campaigns that target the right audience.

- Exceptional English proficiency (C2 level) — strong writing and communication skills.

- Skilled in tools like Google Workspace, Slack, and ATS platforms.

- Comfortable working autonomously and supporting two LLCs with shifting priorities.



Your Key Competencies & Attributes

- Proactivity & Self-Motivation: Stays several steps ahead and takes initiative.

- Resourcefulness & Independence: Handles any type of role with confidence.

- Efficiency & Multitasking: Juggles multiple openings and deadlines seamlessly.

- Creativity & Innovation: Thinks outside the box to source and attract top talent.

- Digital Fluency: Navigates systems and platforms with ease.

- Communication Excellence: Builds rapport and trust with candidates and internal stakeholders.

- Data-Driven Mindset: Uses insights to improve hiring outcomes.

- Flexibility & Resilience: Thrives in dynamic and evolving environments.



What’s In It For You

- 100% Remote Work — Recruit from anywhere in the Philippines

- Career Growth — Opportunity to grow within HR & Talent Acquisition

- Competitive Pay — USD $7/hr as an Independent Contractor

- People-Centric Culture — We value collaboration, innovation, and teamwork



Ready to Build the Future of our Company?

If you’re a proactive, resourceful, and tech-savvy recruiter who thrives on independence and impact — we’d love to hear from you.

title: Bookkeeper
description:
Join Our Remote Accounting Team!

We are a fast-growing, boutique outsourced accounting firm supporting high-growth e-commerce and service-based businesses. While our name remains confidential for now, we’ve been behind the scenes helping some of the most exciting DTC brands scale with confidence through expert bookkeeping, financial systems, and strategic insights.



We are a remote-first company with a collaborative, client-first culture — and we’re looking for exceptional talent to grow with us.



We’re seeking a detail-oriented, tech-savvy Bookkeeper to manage financial records, process transactions, and generate critical reports to support client decision-making. You’ll play a key role in ensuring books are accurate, clean, and up-to-date — and bring clarity to fast-moving businesses.



What You’ll Be Doing

As our Bookkeeper, you’ll support multiple clients with day-to-day accounting operations, reconciling accounts, and managing both AP and AR functions.



Your Core Responsibilities:

- Record and categorize financial transactions using QuickBooks Online

- Reconcile bank, credit card, and merchant accounts

- Prepare and analyze financial reports (P&L, Balance Sheets, Cash Flow Statements)

- Perform invoicing, collections, and accounts receivable tracking

- Process bills and manage accounts payable workflows

- Process payroll and ensure timely tax remittances

- Track and maintain accurate inventory accounting records

- Communicate with clients via dedicated channels (Slack,
, Meetings)

- Support ad hoc bookkeeping and administrative needs as required



What You’ll Bring to the Table

**Experience & Skills:

- 3+ years of experience as a Bookkeeper

- Advanced QuickBooks Online skills are required

- Strong grasp of inventory tracking and accounting best practices

- Experience reconciling financial data across multiple platforms

- Experience with NetSuite is required

- Proficient with Google Workspace, Excel, and Word

- Experience working with e-commerce or service-based businesses is a plus

**Communication & Work Environment:

- Advanced English skills (written and spoken – C1 level preferred)

- Strong attention to detail and time management

- Clear communicator who can work independently and manage deadlines

- Tech-savvy and comfortable with remote collaboration tools



What’s In It For You?

- 100% Remote Work - Work from anywhere in the Philippines. No more long commutes or stressful traffic. Spend more quality time with your loved ones and thrive in the comfort of your own home.

- Long-Term Career Growth – With opportunities to scale into higher leadership roles.

Competitive Pay – $10/hr + benefits as an independent contractor

- Supportive Culture – Work alongside a leadership team that values transparency, innovation, and your ideas.

- Positive, People-First Vibes – We believe in balance, fun, and thriving together.

- Annual Performance Reviews – Your growth gets recognized and rewarded.



Ready to Keep the Books Clean & Clients Confident?

If you’re obsessed with accuracy, enjoy structure, and love bringing order to financial chaos — this role is for you. Join our growing team of professionals who value excellence, clarity, and results.

title: Meta Ad Creative Specialist – Performance Obsessed, AI-Native
description:
This role isn't for most creatives. Read carefully.

We're hiring one person to own Meta ad creative across our portfolio of businesses. Not a team. One person who can do what most agencies need five people for.

You'll be responsible for every static, video, and UGC-style ad we run. You'll concept, produce, iterate, and scale—fast. You'll use AI tools not as a crutch but as a multiplier. And you'll be judged on one thing: results.

The Reality of This Role

You'll kill your own work when the data says it's not performing

You'll operate with minimal oversight and maximum accountability



What You Must Be Able to Do



Create scroll-stopping static ads

Produce short-form video ads optimized for Reels, Stories, and Feed

Script and edit UGC-style content that feels native, not produced

Write direct response copy that converts—hooks, body, CTA

Use AI tools fluently across image generation, video production, voice, and editing

Analyze creative performance in Ads Manager and translate data into next iterations

Move fast without sacrificing quality



What Separates You From Everyone Else



You've personally created ads that have driven six figures or more in tracked revenue

You understand why an ad works, not just that it worked

You think in frameworks: problem-agitate-solve, hook-story-offer, us vs. them

You can produce founder-led style content, talking head ads, and 
-format creative

You treat AI as your production team, not a novelty

You're relentless about testing and unattached to your own ideas



Non-Negotiables



Portfolio of Meta ads with documented performance metrics (ROAS, CPA, or revenue driven)

Demonstrated proficiency with AI creative tools across multiple categories

Ability to work US business hours with fast communication

You can show us a raw creative and the five iterations you tested after it



We Don't Care About



Your degree

How many followers you have

Awards or agency pedigree

Creative that's "on brand" but doesn't sell



Compensation

Competitive base plus performance bonuses tied directly to ad results. This is a high-output role and we pay accordingly for high performers.

To Apply

title: Amazon Merch T-Shirt Designer (AI-Assisted, Original Designs + SEO Optimization)
description:
Overview



We are looking for a detail-oriented Amazon Merch T-Shirt Designer who can combine AI-assisted design workflows with strong judgment, originality, and strict compliance.



This role is not about copying top sellers or flooding Merch with duplicates. You will research niches intelligently, create original designs, write optimized Amazon Merch SEO listings, and follow copyright, trademark, and Amazon Merch policies carefully.



This is a long-term role for someone who understands that Merch success comes from originality, compliance, and iteration — not shortcuts.



Key Responsibilities

Design & Creative



- Create original t-shirt designs using AI tools (Midjourney, Ideogram, Leonardo, DALL·E, Flux, etc.) combined with human refinement

- Adapt designs to different niches (text-based, minimalist, graphic, humor, lifestyle, seasonal, evergreen)

- Ensure no direct replication of existing top-selling designs, layouts, or slogans

- Make thoughtful variations without infringing on existing listings



Niche & Market Research



Research Amazon Merch niches to understand:

- Buyer intent

- Competition and saturation

- Style and messaging trends

- Study top sellers for inspiration only, never duplication

- Identify gaps and unique angles within niches



SEO & Listing Optimization



Write Amazon Merch–optimized:

- Title

- Brand

- Bullet points



Description (where applicable)

- Apply keyword research using natural, buyer-focused language

- Avoid keyword stuffing or misleading terms

- Optimize listings for search visibility and conversion



Compliance & Risk Control (CRITICAL)

Perform copyright and trademark checks before submission



Understand and comply with:

- Amazon Merch on Demand content policies

- Trademark restrictions (USPTO and equivalents)

- Prohibited phrases, protected terms, and IP rules



Avoid:

- Trademarked phrases

- Celebrity names

- Brand references

- Song lyrics, movie quotes, slogans, or protected characters

- Flag risky ideas before delivery, not after rejections



Workflow & Organization

- Deliver all work via a shared spreadsheet, not by uploading to Amazon

- Fill out required spreadsheet fields accurately, including:



Niche



- Design concept or theme

- SEO title



Brand name

- Bullet points

- Keywords

- Notes on trademark checks performed

- Attach or link design files as instructed

- Track niches and designs to prevent duplication

- Follow naming conventions and formatting guidelines provided



Work Schedule



- Up to 10 hours per week

- Flexible schedule

- Quality, originality, and compliance matter more than raw speed



Trial Period

This role starts with a paid 1-hour trial



The trial is used to evaluate:

- Design originality

- Niche understanding

- SEO writing quality

- Compliance awareness

- Spreadsheet accuracy and workflow

- How many designs can be created an hour



How to Apply (Required) otherwise entries will be ignored. If you do not know and still feel like you have the execution skills for this job feel free to apply but still answer the questions.



To apply, please answer all three questions below. Applications that skip these will not be reviewed.

1. Amazon Merch Compliance

keywords, readability, or buyer intent — and why?

title: SEO Specialist
description:
**Sign-On Bonus**

We are happy to offer a $250 US sign-on bonus! The first $100 will come at the end of your first week of work. The additional $150 will come at the completion of 90 days of work for a full $250 bonus.



About Shop Marketing Pros:

We are a marketing agency based in the United States with a stateside and international team of over 40 professionals. Shop Marketing Pros is a very well-respected and rapidly growing Digital Marketing Company in the Automotive Repair Industry with strong core values and a superb track record of serving its clients better than the competitors. Our key services include Website Design, Digital Advertising, Search Engine Optimization, and Social Media Management. 



Our Core Values are of incredible importance to us. We live by our “Shield” so please visit 
/core-values/ and familiarize yourself with our Core Values before continuing. Please continue with this job description and application if you feel you align with these values.



Job Description:

Shop Marketing Pros is seeking a driven, strategic SEO Specialist to join our team. This role is responsible for developing, executing, and optimizing SEO strategies that improve search visibility, drive qualified traffic, and generate measurable results for our clients.

The ideal candidate is analytical, detail-oriented, and experienced in local, organic, technical, and AI-assisted SEO. You should be comfortable managing multiple websites and campaigns simultaneously while translating data, research, structured data, and AI insights into effective, scalable SEO solutions. This position plays a key role in elevating client growth and supporting long-term SEO performance across a diverse portfolio.



Required Skills:

The perfect candidate has 

3+ years of proven SEO experience, with a demonstrated record of driving measurable growth

Strong experience in local and organic SEO, including strategy development and execution

Hands-on experience with AI-driven SEO workflows, including AI-assisted research, content optimization, and adapting strategies for AI-influenced search results

Working knowledge of schema markup and structured data (LocalBusiness, Service, FAQ, Review, Organization, etc.) and how it impacts visibility and CTR

Advanced skills in SEO research, including keyword research, search intent analysis, competitor research, and opportunity mapping

Proficiency in WordPress, particularly Elementor, and managing multiple websites at scale

Strong understanding of technical SEO principles, including site structure, indexing, crawlability, and page performance

Familiarity with SEO tools such as Analytics, SEMRush, Ubersuggest, Ahrefs, MOZ Local, Screaming Frog, and Google Search Console

A self-starter mindset balanced with strong collaboration and team contribution

Exceptional attention to detail and the ability to QA work before delivery is a MUST



Not required, but strongly valued:

Experience working in a high-volume SEO agency environment, managing multiple client accounts simultaneously

Ability to adapt strategies to different industries, with an emphasis on local SEO for service-based businesses

Strong critical thinking and problem-solving skills, with the ability to proactively identify growth opportunities

Clear, confident communication skills; able to explain complex SEO concepts to both internal teams and clients

Strong time management and time-blocking skills in a fast-paced, deadline-driven environment



Job Responsibilities:

*Conduct in-depth keyword, intent, and competitive research to identify SEO opportunities for both organic and local search

*Develop and implement advanced SEO strategies, including on-page, off-page, technical, and AI-supported initiatives

*Perform technical SEO audits and execute recommendations (site speed, indexing, URL structure, schema, internal linking)

*Implement and maintain schema markup and structured data to improve search visibility and rich results

*Optimize Google Business Profiles (GBP) to enhance local SEO performance and engagement

*Perform competitor analysis to stay ahead of industry trends and algorithm changes

*Collaborate with writers to produce SEO-first, conversion-focused content aligned with client goals

*Manage WordPress websites using Elementor, including content publishing, on-page optimization, and redirects

*Utilize tools such as RankMath, WP Rocket, and other SEO plugins to improve performance and compliance

*Execute ethical link-building and citation-building strategies, including backlink audits and disavows when needed

*Support site migrations and content transitions from old to new websites

*Analyze performance using Google Analytics, Google Search Console, MOZ Local, SEMRush, Ubersuggest, and Ahrefs to guide ongoing optimization

*Create clear, actionable reports that communicate insights and results to CSMs and clients

*Develop and manage GBP posts, business descriptions, and product listings, leveraging AI tools (including ChatGPT) for personalization and efficiency

*Stay current on SEO, AI search trends, and algorithm updates to keep strategies competitive and future-ready



More Info + Benefits + Perks:

1. This is a full-time, permanent, remote position (Central Time).

2. 13th Month Pay

3. Unlimited PTO (after 3 months of employment)

4. 8 Paid Holiday Leaves

5. Paid time off beginning Christmas Eve until New Year’s Day

6. An extraordinary team/company culture



Instructions for Application:

1. Use this subject line: “SMP SEO - [Your Nickname]"

2. In your cover letter, mention which of our core values resonates with you the most.

3. Include a link to your resume.

4. Use at least 7 Apply Points to qualify for this job.

5. Please DO NOT
 me.

title: Senior Frontend Developer (ASP.NET UI Expert)
description:
We are Mission Lens, a startup dedicated to providing powerful and intuitive software solutions for Non-Profit and Community Organizations. We are looking for a highly skilled 
 Frontend Developer to join our small but talented team and help us build user interfaces that make a real-world impact.



As a startup, we work in a fast-paced environment and have a team of strong, dedicated developers. This is a heavy UI development role for an expert in JavaScript and CSS who is passionate about creating clean, responsive, and engaging user experiences.



This is a part-time position with a strong possibility of transitioning to a full-time role in the future for the right candidate.



Key Responsibilities:

• Take the lead on developing, implementing, and refining user-facing features for our web applications.

• Write expert-level, clean, and maintainable JavaScript and CSS.

• Translate UI/UX design wireframes into high-quality, functional code.

• Collaborate closely with our backend developers to integrate front-end components.

• Ensure our applications are optimized for speed, scalability, and responsiveness across all devices.



Required Skills and Experience:

• Experience: Minimum of 5 years of professional software development experience.

• Frontend Expertise: Expert-level proficiency in hand-coding JavaScript and CSS. You should be able to create complex, responsive layouts and animations without relying on frameworks.

• Adaptability: Proven ability to learn new technologies and frameworks quickly. While the core skills are JS/CSS, our environment uses ASP.NET and Blazor.

• Communication: Strong English communication skills.

• Availability: Must be available for team collaboration and meetings between 7:00 AM and 9:00 AM Eastern Standard Time (EST) daily (Monday to Friday).



Work Schedule & Compensation:

• Position: Part-time (approximately 20 hours per week).

• Schedule: Flexible hours outside of the required 7 AM - 9 AM EST daily overlap.

• Pay Rate: $16 - $18 USD per hour, depending on experience.

• Future Growth: This role has the potential to become a full-time position, which would include a full benefits package.



HOW TO APPLY:

To ensure we find the best fit for our team, we have a unique application process. We will only consider candidates who complete the following small technical project. This shows us your skills and your genuine interest in the role.



Mandatory Application Project:

You are required to create a simple Blazor application that demonstrates your ability to manipulate the UI.

Project Instructions:

1. Create a new, standard Blazor Web App project. The default template with sample pages is perfectly fine.

2. Add a "hamburger" button (icon) at the top left corner of the main layout.

3. Implement the following functionality:

o When the user clicks the hamburger button for the first time, the sidebar navigation menu should smoothly minimize (e.g., collapse to show only icons).

o When the user clicks the button again OR hovers their mouse over the minimized sidebar, it should expand back to its original, full state.

4. Push the code to a public repository on GitHub, GitLab, or a similar platform.

5. Ensure the project is live and accessible.

This is an established construction company delivering residential and commercial projects across the UK. We work with architects, developers, and consultants, and pride ourselves on professionalism, reliability, and clear communication. As the business grows, we are looking for a highly organised Virtual Assistant to support day-to-day operations, client communication, and business development activities.



Role Overview

The Virtual Assistant will provide administrative, communication, and light marketing and sales support to the CEO. This is a hands-on role requiring excellent written communication, strong organisational skills, and confidence interacting with clients, consultants, and prospects.



Key Responsibilities

Administration & Communication

* Manage and respond to
s in a professional, timely manner

* Organise calendars, schedule meetings and calls, and manage follow-ups

* Prepare and format documents 
s, proposals, simple reports)

* Maintain contact lists, client records, and basic CRM updates



Business Development & Outreach

* Research potential clients, developers, consultants, and partners

* Conduct cold outreach via
 and LinkedIn (using provided templates and guidance)

* Follow up on leads and book introductory calls

* Keep lead pipelines organised and up to date



LinkedIn & Online Presence

* Support CEOs LinkedIn profile

* Draft and schedule LinkedIn posts (project updates, insights, announcements)

* Engage with relevant industry content (likes, comments, connections)

* Assist with basic personal and company brand positioning



General Support

* Assist with ad-hoc administrative tasks as needed

* Coordinate with external consultants (marketing, PR, designers) when required



Required Skills & Experience

* Proven experience as a Virtual Assistant, Executive Assistant, or similar role

* Excellent written and spoken English (essential)

* Strong organisational and time-management skills

* Confidence in professional communication with clients and senior stakeholders

* Comfortable using tools such as ChatGPT, Microsoft Office, Calendly, Mailchimp (or similar), and basic CRM systems



Hours & Compensation

* Part-time or full-time (flexible, to be agreed)

* Remote role

title: Virtual Assistant / Bookkeeper (QuickBooks Online – Long-Term)
description:
We are a growing US-based accounting and advisory practice serving real estate investors and service-based businesses (contractors, professional services, small business owners). We are looking for a detail-oriented Virtual Assistant / Junior Bookkeeper to support day-to-day bookkeeping, administrative tasks, and internal processes.



This role is ideal for someone who wants stable, long-term work, is eager to learn US accounting practices, and is comfortable working exclusively in QuickBooks Online (QBO).



You will work closely with the owner (CPA) and follow established SOPs. Training and clear guidance will be provided.



Key Responsibilities

     * Bookkeeping & Accounting Support (Primary)

     * Categorize bank and credit card transactions in QuickBooks Online

     * Assist with bank and credit card reconciliations

     * Identify uncategorized, duplicate, or suspicious transactions

     * Maintain clean, organized, and audit-ready books

     * Upload and attach receipts and supporting documents in QBO

     * Assist with monthly close checklists

     * Follow QBO best practices (chart of accounts, classes, rules, etc.)



Administrative & VA Support

     * Organize client documents (Google Drive / Dropbox)

     * Maintain internal trackers (Google Sheets)

     * Assist with client onboarding tasks and questionnaires

     * Help prepare reports for review (P&L, Balance Sheet, transaction summaries)

     * Basic
 follow-ups and task coordination (no sales calls)



Required Skills & Qualifications

     * Experience with QuickBooks Online (QBO) is REQUIRED

     * Basic understanding of bookkeeping or accounting principles

     * Strong attention to detail and accuracy

     * Comfortable following SOPs and checklists

     * Good written English communication skills

     * Reliable internet connection and computer

     * Honest, dependable, and organized

     * Willing to learn and grow with the company



Preferred (Nice to Have)

     * Previous experience working with US clients

     * Experience with:

          * Real estate bookkeeping OR

          * Service-based businesses (contractors, professionals)

     * Familiarity with:

          * Bank reconciliations

          * Credit card reconciliations

          * Receipt management

     * Background in accounting, finance, or bookkeeping (formal or informal)

     * CPA or CPA candidate



Software & Tools Used

     * QuickBooks Online (QBO) – required

     * Google Workspace (Docs, Sheets, Drive)

     *
 (Gmail)

     * Task management tools 



Compensation

     * Competitive hourly or monthly rate (based on experience)

     * Regular, on-time payments

     * Performance-based raises and increased responsibilities over time



What We Offer

     * Long-term, stable work

     * Clear processes and expectations

     * Hands-on training and mentorship

     * Opportunity to grow into:

          * Senior Bookkeeper

          * Lead VA

          * Specialized real estate bookkeeping role

     * Respectful, professional work environment



How to Apply

 Please include:

     * A brief introduction about yourself

     * Your QuickBooks Online experience (years and tasks handled)

     * Any bookkeeping or accounting background

     * Your internet speed and availability (hours per week)
